Actions.Name: Flame Dance
Actions.Effects: Dash 2, then deal [fray] piercing damage to a different character in range 6.

Actions.Name: Carnivale
Actions.Description: The Fire dancer summons a bomb in range 4.

Summons.Name: Bomb
Summons.Effects: Can be shoved. When taking any amount of damage, explodes for a blast 1 area effect explosion. Characters within become vulnerable, then must save or take [D]+[fray] to characters within and become burning, or just [fray] damage.

Actions.Name: Juggle
Actions.Description: The fire dancer starts juggling flames. While in this stance, at the end of their turn, or when they dash, they can deal [fray] piercing damage to a character in range 6.
